messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Martin Gardner
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ve loved him for years, and my favorites were the books about The Incredible Dr. Matrix, which I think were titled something like that, and then there
messages.messageBody:
On Sat, 1 Dec 2001 11:57:48 EST SandraDodd@... writes:
>
> Most popular matches for martin gardner :

I've loved him for years, and my favorites were the books about The
Incredible Dr. Matrix, which I think were titled something like that, and
then there was great one that was within the past 10 years or so , and I
can't remember the title but Cacie and I had a ball with it, there was a
whole section on experiements and things with eggs, and another about
Taxicab geomtery, which is basically geometry on a grid system.

Has anyone mentioned The Man Who Counted? That was a cool book.

We used to go to Lawrence Hall of Science when we lived near Berkeley and
play a lot of mathy games, like Hex, and Nim... I think LHS has some
books out, too. Some of their games were kinda dull, but we liked those
two.

Dar

messages.subject: Martin Gardner
messages.msgSnippet: Most popular matches for martin gardner : *   The Colossal Book of Mathematics: Classic Puzzles, Paradoxes, and Problems -- by Martin Gardner; Hardcover Our

by Martin Gardner
1. The Colossal Book of Mathematics: Classic Puzzles, Paradoxes, and
Problems
by Martin Gardner (Hardcover)


2. The Annotated Alice: The Definitive Edition
by Lewis Carroll, et al (Hardcover - November 1999)


3. Classic Brainteasers
by Martin Gardner, Jeff Sinclair (Illustrator) (Paperback - October 1995)

4. Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and Through the Looking Glass
by Lewis Carroll, et al (Mass Market Paperback - December 2000)


5. Calculus Made Easy : Being a Very-Simplest Introduction to Those
Beautiful Methods of Reckoning Which Are Generally Called by the Terrifying
Names of
by Silvanus P. Thompson, Martin Gardner (Hardcover)


6. Perplexing Puzzles and Tantalizing Teasers/2 Volumes in 1
by Martin Gardner, Laszlo Kubinyi (Illustrator) (Paperback - December 1988)


7. Did Adam and Eve Have Navels?: Debunking Pseudoscience
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - October 2001)

8. Second Scientific American Book of Mathematical Puzzles and Diversions
by Martin Gardner (Editor) (Paperback - October 1987)

9. A Gardner's Workout : Training the Mind and Entertaining the Spirit
by Martin Gardner (Hardcover)


10. Best Remembered Poems
by Martin Gardner (Editor) (Paperback - December 1992)

(I'm not sure this is the same guy, but it might be!)

11.
Weird Water & Fuzzy Logic : More Notes of a Fringe Watcher
by Martin Gardner (Hardcover - October 1996)



12.The Universe in a Handkerchief : Lewis Carroll's Mathematical Recreations,
Games, Puzzles, and Word Plays
by Martin Gardner, Lewis Carroll (Paperback - June 1996)

13. Fads and Fallacies in the Name of Science
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - December 1957)


14. Visitors from Oz : The Wild Adventures of Dorothy, the Scarecrow, and the
Tin Woodman
by Martin Gardner, L. Frank Wizard of Oz Baum (Hardcover - October 1998)

15. The Annotated Thursday : G.K. Chesterton's Masterpiece, the Man Who Was
Thursday
by G. K. Chesterton, Martin Gardner (Editor) (Paperback - October 1999)

16.Hexaflexagons and Other Mathematical Diversions : The First Scientific
American Book of Puzzles and Games
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - October 1988)

17.My Best Mathematical and Logic Puzzles
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - November 1994)

18. On the Wild Side
by Martin Gardner (Hardcover - April 1992)

19.From the Wandering Jew to William F. Buckley, Jr. : On Science,
Literature, and Religion
by Martin Gardner (Hardcover - October 2000)


20. The New Age : Notes of a Fringe-Watcher
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - April 1991)

21. The Unexpected Hanging : And Other Mathematical Diversions
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - September 1991)

22. Steve Allen on the Bible, Religion, and Morality
by Steve Allen, Martin Gardner (Hardcover - September 1990)


23. Penrose Tiles to Trapdoor Ciphers : And the Return of Dr. Matrix (Maa
Spectrum)
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - May 1997)


24. The Wreck of the Titanic Foretold?
by Martin Gardner (Introduction) (Paperback - March 1998)

25. Codes, Ciphers and Secret Writing
by Martin Gardner (Paperback - October 1984)
